full_text:
Hi Jo,
Yesterday I went to the Majestic Cinema here in Abidjan. There was a beautiful romantic scene where the two characters kissed under the rain — everyone in the cinema clapped! Would you like to come with me next time?
See you soon,
BERTHE

(ENGLISH
 
BELOW)

un

de

en

et
 
en
 
français
 
pour
 
le
 
test
 
de
 
positionnement
 
en
 
langues
 
SELF
 
(
https://self.univ-grenoble-alpes.fr/
)
 
,
 
nous
 
proposons
 
un
 
second
 
stage
 
de
 
6
 
mois
 
consacré
 
à
 
la
 
modélisation
 
prédictive
 
des
 
scores
 
de
 
compétence
 
de
 
production
 
orale
 
.
 
 
Le
 
ou
 
la
 
stagiaire
 
travaillera
 
à
 
partir
 
d’un
 
corpus

d’étudiants
 
évalués
 
par
 
des

humains.
 
L’objectif
 
principal
 
est
 
d’extraire
 
une
 
variété
 
de
 
paramètres
 
acoustiques,
 
linguistiques
 
et
 
de
 
représentations
 
apprises
 
(par
 
exemple
 
issues
 
de
 
modèles
 
d’apprentissage
 
auto-supervisé),
 
et
 
d’identifier
 
ceux
 
qui
 
permettent
 
de
 
prédire
 
au
 
mieux
 
le
 
niveau
 
de
 
compétence
 
de
 
production
 
orale
 
de
 
l’étudiant
 
.
 
Ces
 
caractéristiques
 
seront
 
ensuite
 
utilisées
 
pour
 
entraîner
 
et
 
évaluer
 
un
 
modèle
 
de
 
prédiction
 
de
 
score
 
,
 
qui
 
sera
 
intégré
 
au
 
test
 
de
 
positionnement
 
SELF.
 
 
Le
 
ou
 
la
 
stagiaire
 
intégrera
 
l’équipe
 
GETALP
 
(
https://lig-getalp.imag.fr/
)
 
 
(Groupe
 
d’Étude
 
en
 
Traduction
 
Automatique
 
et
 
Traitement
 
Automatisé
 
des
 
Langues
 
et
 
de
 
la
 
Parole
 
)
 
au
 
sein
 
du
 
laboratoire
 
LIG,
 
en
 
collaboration
 
avec
 
un
 
autre
 
stagiaire
 
recruté
 
sur
 
le
 
même
 
projet,
 
et
 
un
 
chercheur
 
à
 
temps
 
plein.
 
Il
 
ou
 
elle
 
rejoindra
 
une
 
dynamique
 
de
 
projet
 
impliquant
 
des
 
enseignants
 
en
 
langues
 
(anglais
 
et
 
français)
 
et
 
en
 
didactique,
 
issus
 
de
 
l'université
 
de
 
Grenoble
 
et
 
de
 
différentes
 
universités
 
partenaires.

recherché
 
:
 
 
 
-
   
Solide
 
formation
 
en
 
apprentissage
 
automatique
 
et
 
en
 
traitement
 
de
 
la
 
     
parole
 
;
 
-

de
 
Python
 
et
 
des
 
bibliothèques
 
d’apprentissage
 
automatique
 
     
(par
 
ex.
 
scikit-learn
 
,
 
PyTorch
 
,
 
ou
 
équivalent)
 
;
 
-
   
Connaissances
 
en
 
technologies
 
de
 
la
 
parole
 
(ASR,
 
analyse
 
prosodique,
 
     
embeddings,
 
etc.)
 
;
 -
   
Un
 
intérêt
 
pour
 
l’
 
apprentissage
 
des
 
langues
 
et
 
les

éducatives
 
serait
 
un
 
plus.

:

text:
OCTOBER EVALUATION 
I/VOCABULARY

I have always been interested in the weather and how it can change our lives. One of the most memorable events in my life happened three years ago because of the clim...
full_text:
OCTOBER EVALUATION 
I/VOCABULARY

I have always been interested in the weather and how it can change our lives. One of the most memorable events in my life happened three years ago because of the climate. It was during the rainy season in my town. Usually, it rains a little every day, but that year was different.
For one whole week, the rain didn’t stop. The streets were full of water, and people had to walk carefully. Some shops were closed, and schools didn’t open for two days. Everyone was worried because the river was rising very fast.
Then, on Friday morning, the rain finally stopped. The sun came out, and the air felt fresh and cool. People came out of their houses to clean the streets and talk with their neighbors. In the afternoon, a big rainbow appeared across the sky. It was the most beautiful rainbow I had ever seen!
That day was unforgettable for me. Even though the week was difficult, it brought people together. We helped each other, shared food, and smiled again when the sun returned. Now, whenever it rains, I remember that week and how strong our community became.
A/Comprehension Questions
When did the memorable event happen?
Answer : The memorable event happen three years ago.
What was unusual about the weather that week?
Answer : For that week, the rain didn’t stop.
How did the rain affect daily life in the town?
Answer : The streets were full of water, and people had to walk carefully. Some shops were closed, and schools didn’t open for two days. Everyone was worried because the river was rising very fast.
What happened when the rain stopped?
Answer : When the rain stopped, the sun came out, and the air felt fresh and cool. People came out of their houses to clean the streets and talk with their neighbors.
Why does the writer still remember that event?
Answer : The writer still remember that event because that day was unforgettable for him.
Have you have ever experienced a similar event ?
Tell me about it (5 lines)
Answer : Yes ! I have a similar event. During october 2025, there is a week where it rained for three days. The streets were full of water, and people had to walk carefully. Some shops were closed, we couldn’t go to schools and we did the online classes during these days. Everyone was worried because the river was rising very fast. In some neighboods, water remained in the streets all week. 
B/ What are the opposite of these words : Unforgettable, worried, beautiful, forget.
Unforgettable # forgettable
Beautiful # ugly
Worried # relaxed
Forget # remember

II-GRAMMAR
A/Complete the sentences with in, on, by, get in, get on, get off, or get out of.
I usually go to work _by__ bus.
She was sitting _in__ the car, waiting for her friend.
We travelled __on_ train from Abidjan to Bouaké.
Don’t forget to __get out of_ the taxi quickly; it’s raining.
He fell asleep __on_ the plane.
When the bus stopped, everyone get off___.
I couldn’t __get out of_ the car because it was locked.
They went to the village _by__ motorbike.
Let’s _get on__ the subway before it leaves!
She got tired and decided to _get out of__ the car to stretch her legs.
B/ Complete each sentence with the correct form of the verbs in brackets:
Use Past Simple or Past Continuous.
I _was cooking_ (cook) dinner when the phone __rang___ (ring).
They _were watching___ (watch) TV while their parents __were talking_ (talk) in the kitchen.
When the rain _started_ (start), we __were_playing__ (play) football.
She _was falling _ (fall) asleep while she __read___ (read) a book.
I __don’t_heard__ (not / hear) you because I am listening__ (listen) to music.
While he _was_walking_ (walk) home, he  met_ (meet) an old friend.
The students __were discussing_ (discuss) the lesson when the teacher _arrived_ (arrive).
I _dropped_ (drop) my keys while I was running_ (run) to catch the bus.
They __don’t_went____ (not / go) out because it __was rainning__ (rain).
What __were__ you __doing__ (do) when the lights _were going___ (go) out?
III-READING
Record yourself reading the text above and sendit to me on whatsapp

IV-WRITING
Tell a memorable event using  the past simple, past continuous… (12lines)
I will never forget my recent accident. A sunday, we went to play football with me friend. When we arrived at the stadium, the men started to play football. The girls and I were dansing to encourage the men, everything was going well. After half time, I decided to play. It was the beginning of my difficulties. Firstly, I hurt one person in another team just 5 mins after my enter. Secondly, I fell when I wanted to shoot on goal. I was really in pain, it’s was really sad. We went to the hospital after the fall and after examination, the doctor said it was a fracture and I had to surgery. I was really scared and I was crying, my friends were trying to comfort me but it was difficult. After crying, I was hospitalised and the next day, I had surgery.
V-SPEAKING
What is your favorite means of transportation ?  and Why ?  
Record yourself and send it to me on
